    AIF in social media
    1. All

    The first cinder of catch 2024 was observed at Petersburg.

    29.02.2024 18:31Comments (0)
    A lot of people in town doubt that it's fresh because the season of her sales usually starts in April. But there are ways to distinguish fresh fish from frozen fish.
    Share:Total

    Half of the estimates in Petersburg stores do not conform to the standards

    27.02.2024 09:16Comments (0)
    Professionals of the " Public Control " checked the estimate for sale at the city ' s stores and found that the contents of each second package violated GOST.
    Share:Total

    Mam and daughter's mysterious poisoning at Birthday is being investigated in Petersburg

    16.02.2024 12:22Comments (0)
    They were found unconscious on the floor, carried out reconnaissance activities and taken to the hospital in a difficult state.
    Share:Total

    The mass poisoning of pheterburg graduates was estimated by the court at 500,000 roubles

    15.02.2024 17:03Comments (0)
    Vadim Lakshin, the perpetrator of this business, pleaded guilty and will pay a fine.
    Share:Total

    What kind of exotic fly found in the bathed bananas a Murino resident?

    14.02.2024 19:35Comments (0)
    The buyer claims it's a dangerous muha-horbat.
    Category:Society
    Questioning:0

    Pieterburg graduates ' mass poisoning are tried

    08.02.2024 20:12Comments (0)
    This is about poisoning at the Grand Bianko restaurant, when students from 9 urban schools were injured, with only 112 victims.
    Share:Total

    The seller of the sanctions products identified Petersburg in the Torzkov market

    07.02.2024 09:32Comments (0)
    Traded dairy and meat products from the European Union without documents were fined 20,000 roubles.
    Share:Total

    Products by gift? Would free food be beneficial

    01.02.2024 18:34Comments (0)
    The Ghosmudians suggested that the Riteilers should be obliged to create social shelves with products that expire.
    Share:Total

    The court recognized the bankruptcy of the major poultry " Ddarnik " in Len Regioni

    25.01.2024 20:24Comments (0)
    Difficulties have been pursued by the enterprise since 2017, and in the 2019s, the enterprise received the first claim that it was insolvent.
    Share:Total

    Why did Petersburg prohibit alcoholic ice cream?

    22.01.2024 20:14Comments (0)
    The production, storage, supply and sale of such produce will now require a licence.
    Category:Society
    Questioning:0

    Will the price be reduced to the sharply expensive eggs in Petersburg?

    22.01.2024 19:12Comments (0)
    In general, the Len Region delivers up to 3.5 billion eggs annually. It's too much for the residents and the needs of Petersburg.
    Category:Society
    Questioning:0

    Mass poisoning at a school in the centre of Petersburg could be a criminal case.

    19.01.2024 13:25Comments (0)
    On the eve of school No. 260 in the Admiralty district, the Rosscondor closed. At present, 63 poisons have been recorded.
    Share:Total

    It's a long time to bury at the end. 5 secrets of the perfect cold

    29.12.2023 14:28Comments (0)
    One of the central dishes of the Russian holiday table is certainly a cold.
    Share:Total

    Not orange, but gold. Why did the mandarins go to Petersburg?

    25.12.2023 13:37Comments (0)
    At the end of the fall of 2023, buyers had concerns about the shortage of mandarin on food shelves. Human beings are probably confused by another escalation of the military conflict in Israel.
    Share:Total

    The Petburns spoke about three ways of choosing a real red caviar.

    05.12.2023 11:58Comments (0)
    In the run-up to the new year, Deputy Chief, Division for Quality Control of Products and Consumer Services The Natalia Taldykin Quality Control Centre shared its methods of distinguishing forgery from this product.
    Share:Total

    Petburjers have been advised how to choose “right”

    21.11.2023 10:07Comments (0)
    The public found that some manufacturers had started saving meat for their fixation.
    Share:Total

    The price of tomatoes rose sharply in Petersburg in October

    11.11.2023 4:00Comments (0)
    They also loved garlic and bananas. And the cucumbers, the cabbage, the potato and the wind, on the other hand, have become cheaper.
    Share:Total

    Appetitive profession. As young cooks become famous cooks

    01.11.2023 09:47Comments (0)
    Share:Total

    The Broadski Museum will open a Chinese restaurant and a bar at the Muruzi House.

    23.10.2023 13:58Comments (0)
    The famous writer and the Nobel Laureate, 17 years old living on Lithein, 24, loved Chinese food very much. The Museum ' s founders and " failed " therefore.
    Share:Total

    The Riteillers announced a shortage of chicken eggs and higher prices in Petersburg

    22.10.2023 09:35Comments (0)
    This is due to outbreaks of smoking influenza observed in 39 regions of the Russian Federation, including those bordering on Len oblast. The shortage could also be caused by a shortage of labour force poultry.
    Share:Total
